headline: Immediate Joiner | Production Support Engineer | 3 Yrs in SQL, Unix, Shell Scripting | Banking Domain | Incident Mgmt | L2 Support | ITIL | Immediate Joiner.
about:
I am an experienced Production Support / Application Support Engineer with 3 years of hands-on experience in supporting mission-critical applications in the Banking domain.

Skilled in SQL, Unix/Linux, Shell Scripting, and log analysis, I have worked on resolving real-time incidents, monitoring system performance, and ensuring high availability of applications.

I have practical knowledge of tools like ServiceNow, JIRA, Grafana,Postman and have been involved in L1/L2 support, incident management, and root cause analysis (RCA).

I‚Äôm used to working in 24x7 environments, handling batch failures, and coordinating with development and QA teams for quick issue resolution.
